data.name: Color Flash
data.detailed_description:
Color Flash is an endless runner 2d game based on colors. The player has to pass through a series of obstable bars (divided into four tiles) by matching the tile with the same color as the player. Each time the player successfully pass through an obstacle bar, the score will increase by one point. When player hit the wrong tile, the player dies and game ends.

Guidelines:

Move player to the left or right side by side.
Enter tiles that matches the player color or white tiles to pass an obstacle bar
Avoid spiky tiles even if they match your player’s color.
Player color may change when it passes through the level entry bar
Score increases each time you successfully pass an obstacle bar.

data.short_description: Color Flash is an endless runner 2d game based on colors. The player has to pass through a series of obstable bars (divided into four tiles) by matching the tile with the same color as the player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7-10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
